title: My game freezes after the latest patch
body: When ever i try to play a game of league when i go into a game my game will freeze from time to time it happens in every game at anytime i try to uninstall and reinstall but it didnt work. I've been having to force restart my pc and when i try to get back into the game it freezes again. Please Help! This is really annoying.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: I got a similar problem like you...
